verses.verse: וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said וְהֵן֙ <S%H2005><s%> ve-Hen if לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ya-'a-Mi-nu But behold they will not believe לִ֔י Li, וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U me nor hearken בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li; unto my voice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru, for they will say לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- has not נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah hath not appeared אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. The LORD

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD; מַזֶּה maz-zeh כמַה־ mah- זֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he קבְיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-De-cha; able וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מַטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh. A rod

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said הַשְׁלִיכֵ֣הוּ <S%H7993><s%> hash-li-Che-hu Cast אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah, it on the ground וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <S%H7993><s%> vai-yash-li-Che-hu And he cast אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah it on the ground וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became לְנָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> le-na-Chash; and it became a serpent וַיָּ֥נָס <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos fled מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh and Moses מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav. from before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses שְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> she-Lach Put forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha, thine hand וֶאֱחֹ֖ז <S%H270><s%> ve-'e-Choz and take בִּזְנָב֑וֹ <S%H2180><s%> biz-na-Vo; it by the tail וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach And he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand וַיַּ֣חֲזֶק <S%H2388><s%> vai-Ya-cha-zek and caught בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became לְמַטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh it and it became a rod בְּכַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3709><s%> be-chap-Po. in his hand

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of יַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ya-'a-Mi-nu, That they may believe כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> nir-'Ah hath appeared אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei and the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD ל֜וֹ lo ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, furthermore הָֽבֵא־ <S%H935><s%> ha-ve- unto him Put נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na Now יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha now thine hand בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> be-chei-Ke-cha, into thy bosom וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve And he put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <S%H2436><s%> be-chei-Ko; into his bosom וַיּ֣וֹצִאָ֔הּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-Yo-tzi-'Ah, and when he took וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do it out behold his hand מְצֹרַ֥עַת <S%H6879><s%> me-tzo-Ra-'at [was] leprous כַּשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <S%H7950><s%> kash-Sha-leg. as snow

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> ha-Shev again יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha thine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> chei-Ke-cha, into thy bosom וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev again יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into חֵיק֑וֹ <S%H2436><s%> chei-Ko; into his bosom וַיּֽוֹצִאָהּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-tzi-'Ah and plucked מֵֽחֵיק֔וֹ <S%H2436><s%> me-chei-Ko, it out of his bosom וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- behold שָׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> Sha-vah and behold it was turned again כִּבְשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1320><s%> kiv-sa-Ro. as his [other] flesh

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ya-'a-Mi-nu And it shall come to pass if they will not believe לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U, thee neither hearken לְקֹ֖ל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol to the voice הָאֹ֣ת <S%H226><s%> ha-'Ot sign הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> ha-ri-Shon; of the first וְהֶֽאֱמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ve-he-'e-Mi-nu, that they will believe לְקֹ֖ל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol the voice הָאֹ֥ת <S%H226><s%> ha-'Ot sign הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> ha-'a-cha-Ron. of the latter

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo they will not יַאֲמִ֡ינוּ <S%H539><s%> ya-'a-Mi-nu And it shall come to pass if they will not believe גַּם֩ <S%H1571><s%> gam even לִשְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei also these two הָאֹת֜וֹת <S%H226><s%> ha-'o-Tot signs הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יִשְׁמְעוּן֙ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'Un neither hearken לְקֹלֶ֔ךָ <S%H6963><s%> le-ko-Le-cha, unto thy voice וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta that thou shalt take מִמֵּימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> mi-mei-Mei of the water הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or, of the river וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֖ <S%H8210><s%> ve-sha-fach-Ta and pour הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> hai-yab-ba-Shah; [it] upon the dry וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will become הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim [land] and the water אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach which thou takest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or, out of the river וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu will become לְדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> le-Dam shall become blood בַּיַּבָּֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H3006><s%> bai-yab-Ba-shet. upon the dry

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi O אֲדֹנָי֒ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai my Lord לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> lo have never אִ֨ישׁ <S%H582><s%> 'ish not דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim [am] not eloquent אָנֹ֗כִי <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi, I גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> gam neither מִתְּמוֹל֙ <S%H8543><s%> mit-te-mOl before גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> gam nor מִשִּׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> mish-shil-Shom, time גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> gam nor מֵאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> me-'Az nor since דַּבֶּרְךָ <S%H1696><s%> dab-ber-cha thou hast spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; unto thy servant כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כְבַד־ <S%H3515><s%> che-vad- but I [am] slow פֶּ֛ה <S%H6310><s%> peh of speech וּכְבַ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> u-che-Vad and of a slow לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> la-Shon tongue אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi. I

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam unto him Who hath made פֶּה֮ <S%H6310><s%> peh according לָֽאָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> la-'a-Dam man's א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- who יָשׂ֣וּם <S%H7760><s%> ya-Sum makes אִלֵּ֔ם <S%H483><s%> 'il-Lem, the dumb א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or חֵרֵ֔שׁ <S%H2795><s%> che-Resh, or deaf א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or פִקֵּ֖חַ <S%H6493><s%> fik-Ke-ach or the seeing א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or עִוֵּ֑ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver; blind men הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now לֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Lech; go וְאָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- will be with פִּ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-cha, and I will be with thy mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֖יךָ <S%H3384><s%> ve-ho-rei-Ti-cha and teach אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> te-dab-Ber. thee what thou shalt say

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi O אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; my Lord שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach- send נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na now בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- I pray thee by the hand תִּשְׁלָֽח׃ <S%H7971><s%> tish-Lach. [of him whom] thou wilt send

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> vai-yi-char- was kindled אַ֨ף <S%H639><s%> 'af And the anger יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> be-mo-Sheh, against Moses וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron [Is] not Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha your brother הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> hal-le-Vi, the Levite יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti acknowledge כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for דַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber that he can speak יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber well ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and moreover הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- behold הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze And also behold he cometh forth לִקְרָאתֶ֔ךָ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Te-cha, to meet וְרָאֲךָ֖ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'a-Cha thee and when he seeth וְשָׂמַ֥ח <S%H8056><s%> ve-sa-Mach glad בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> be-lib-Bo. in his heart

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ta And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ta unto him and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim words בְּפִ֑יו <S%H6310><s%> be-Fiv; in his mouth וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi, I אֶֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> 'eh-Yeh become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- will be with פִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> pi-cha and I will be with thy mouth וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im- with פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hu, and with his mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֣י <S%H3384><s%> ve-ho-rei-Ti and will teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun. you what ye shall do
